data.title: Mastercard, Stride to Address Benefits Needs of Gig Workers
data.text: Mastercard (MA) collaborates with Stride to cater to the comprehensive benefits needs of gig and independent workers.

data.title: 3 Stock Picks for a 'Buy and Hold' Approach
data.text: Based on a 10-year study that GuruFocus conducted for the period from 1998 to 2008, we can define predictable businesses as enterprises where a consistent growth in their revenue per share and Ebitda per share is reflected in a strong long-term performance of the stocks.
